---
name: feature request
about: suggest a new feature or improvement
title: ''
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''
---

## what's the idea

describe the feature or improvement you'd like to see. be specific about what problem it solves or what capability it adds.

## why do you want this

explain the use case. what scenario would benefit from this feature? how would it make gronka better?

## how should it work

describe how you envision this feature working:

- what command would trigger it? (if applicable)
- what parameters would it accept?
- what would the output look like?
- any edge cases to consider?

## alternatives considered

have you thought about other ways to solve this? existing features that could be extended instead? workarounds you're currently using?

## additional context

any other relevant information. mockups, examples, related discussions, etc.
